main event: On December 7, 1960, two Air Police patrolmen observed a large mysterious lighted UFO in Martinez, California for 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright light and was observed moving erratically over a period of 45 minutes.,No other witnesses were reported during the observation.,The sighting was communicated to Air Force personnel for further investigation.,The duration of the sighting was unusually long for this type of event.,This incident was part of a series of UFO reports collected by Project Blue Book.
